Text:
(I've come to the location designated in the
invitation.)
(And awaiting me here is...)

The blue sky and white clouds. The blue ocean and
white beaches...
...and an impressive resort hotel.

So, it's not some elaborate mission but a vacation...
Well, I guessed as much when I saw the package
contained a swimsuit for me.

But I never guessed they'd go so far as to build a
beach resort... Quite impressive, Gamma, Mitsugoshi.
Quite impressive...

Let's see. If I recall correctly, the letter said to
enter the resort hotel... Guess it's that over there?
Cid enters the hotel mentioned in the letter.
The interior is luxurious and quite spacious.
The designated room should be somewhere around here—
We have been waiting for you...
...my lord.
Those voices... Beta and Epsilon?

On Cid's way to the room, he encounters Beta and
Epsilon.
Wait, are you two my guides?
Indeed, my lord! I will be looking after you!

You mean "we," right? Seriously, quit trying to steal
the limelight.

The others were actually supposed to join us as well,
but they got called away on urgent missions...

I see. That's too bad. I wanted to thank the others
as well.

Oh no! Please don't worry yourself over something
so trivial!
I'll tell them next time I see them.

After you two show me around, will we split up and
enjoy the resort separately?

No, we've been entrusted with the task of being your
guides, my lord.

Our mission today is to support you, my lord. I'm at
your service...even if it's unrelated to our mission!

Wow, you don't slack off, do you? Even when it comes
to having fun. I'll be sure to ask you for anything.
Yes, you can count on me.

Well then, my lord... How about I give you a massage
in your room now? You must be tired from all the
walking. Allow me to take care of you...
Wait, Epsilon? That wasn't on the schedule.

Oh? Beta, you're still there? Why don't you just
leave this to me, and you go prepare dinner or
something?

N-No way are you pulling something like this!
I'm also more than capable!
(Yikes. The two combined might be a bit of a pain...)

The argument between Beta and Epsilon continues for
some time.

This is the special room Gamma prepared. It's a room
exclusively for you, my lord.
Wow. This is amazing.

(On closer inspection...it's not just luxurious.
This looks like a room tailored to my taste...!
Yeah...not bad...)
What's this?

You have a discerning eye, my Lord. That item there
cost 5 million Zeni at auction.
Five—?! ...I see.

Those items there were priced at 3 million,
4.5 million, and 8 million Zeni from right
to left.

The furniture, bed, and decorations are all
first-rate. Gamma went all out in preparing
them.
I-Is that so...

(In short, this is one heck of a room... My sense of
money is going haywire... I think I'd feel nervous
just sleeping on this bed...)

(That said, she's got great taste. I want this entire
room for my shadowbroker collection!)
Heh... Gamma knows her stuff.
I mean, look at this piece...
Cid says this as he reaches toward a nearby painting.
Huh? That painting... N-No way!
Hmm?

My apologies! That's a doodle Delta painted as
a prank!
Huh?

It seems it accidentally got mixed in... Delta was
saying, "I can paint something like this too!" but
I didn't think it would actually get mixed up with
the other pieces...

...That said, I'm impressed by how quickly you saw
through it, my lord. You have a deep understanding
of art which is truly remarkable.
Yeah...s-sure.
Epsilon promptly disposes of Delta's painting.

By the way, when did you manage to build a hotel?
It must've cost a fortune.

M-My apologies! It seems we haven't kept you properly
informed!

After all, despite it being intended to expand
Mitsugoshi's influence, we did spend an
exponential amount of money...
No, I'm not worried about the money, but...

(They're doing interesting things without me knowing
again... I've got mixed feelings about that!)

Oh, my lord! We've also prepared a welcome drink for
you! Please enjoy!
Wow, how thoughtful. Let's see—
Wh-What the...?!

It's a drink called "Ramune," developed based on your
Shadow Wisdom!
(It's a summer drink straight out of my home world!)

(They've even replicated the indentations and the
marble inside! The attention to detail is impressive!)

....Pwaaah! It tastes just like summer!
Gamma is incredible!
...It sounds like Gamma's receiving all the praise...

I don't know why...but I feel like we're losing to
someone who isn't even here...
(Ack... This makes us look bad!)
(Fine, time to do something about this!)

My lord!
My lord!

...Ahem! Y-You surprised me... Wh-What's the
matter?
...My lord. Why don't we head to the beach soon?

The hotel isn't the only selling point of this
resort. There are also beautiful beaches!

Please make yourself at home, and you can visit the
beach afterward...

Oh, you're right. Once I unpack, I'll change and
head there.
Thank you. Well then...see you again later.
Whew...

Nice follow-up, Beta. It's rare for us to be on the
same page.

The hotel's interior is Gamma's domain. We don't
stand a chance against her here...

(But when it comes to the beach, it's a different
story. I'll take advantage of the setting and
my figure...)
(...to impress!)

The two of them enthusiastically head off to get
ready for the beach.
